conversation.content:
- 'intent-id': a4466aac127d45ff8e0e3d2fc5af
  'intent-name': Password Reset
  'description': The user needs to reset their Office 365 password.
  'slot':
  - 'attribute-id': 45aa461ee07944b29de0fb3be637
    'attribute-name': account_type
    'attribute-description': Type of account for which the password needs to be reset.
    'example-values':
    - admin
    - user
    - guest
  - 'attribute-id': bbdbdbaef3f243dda9d4579a30aa
    'attribute-name': current_password
    'attribute-description': The user's current password, if known.
  - 'attribute-id': 15ec3a74aee04f4ba34df828671e
    'attribute-name': new_password
    'attribute-description': The user's desired new password.
- 'intent-id': bda930f7e41a438391e48af7bc31
  'intent-name': Email Access
  'description': The user wants to access their Office 365 email account.
  'slot':
  - 'attribute-id': 470182d95d59462e8e3f7c0fe1b5
    'attribute-name': email_address
    'attribute-description': The email address associated with the Office 365 account.
  - 'attribute-id': 09cb6cba4ff642a1a259230b0f90
    'attribute-name': password
    'attribute-description': The password associated with the Office 365 account.
- 'intent-id': 645b4534a6b04eb5bb60ea2d0a2f
  'intent-name': Share Screen
  'description': Share your screen with other participants during a meeting.
  'slot':
  - 'attribute-id': 3562bbbc0bb54b66aebe6da933bb
    'attribute-name': screen
    'attribute-description': The screen or application that you want to share.
  - 'attribute-id': 6948e3734717426ea35f84a2383d
    'attribute-name': duration
    'attribute-description': The length of time that you want to share your screen.
    'example-values':
    - until I stop sharing
    - for the next 30 minutes
    - for the next hour
  - 'attribute-id': 6c0b6c12b8174be69f9e9480c7aa
    'attribute-name': participants
    'attribute-description': The other participants who will be able to see your screen.
- 'intent-id': e11122f76bd74a1db975c1bfa9d3
  'intent-name': App Installation
  'description': The user needs assistance installing Office 365 apps on
    their device.
  'slot':
  - 'attribute-id': b79870e60dc84297a6f8670dbacc
    'attribute-name': application
    'attribute-description': The specific Office 365 application to install.
  - 'attribute-id': e423fa90093a46a2996b26e28f40
    'attribute-name': device
    'attribute-description': The type of device on which to install the application.
    'example-values':
    - Windows PC
    - Mac
    - iPhone
    - Android Phone
    - iPad
- 'intent-id': 9551d5871c994649bb4a2bbab051
  'intent-name': License Activation
  'description': The user requires help activating their Office 365 license.
  'slot':
  - 'attribute-id': 77ad44c23f8c4cfcb72c3d8352f3
    'attribute-name': license_type
    'attribute-description': The type of Office 365 license the user has purchased.
  - 'attribute-id': 44598c65178f4e8db33e9c38a614
    'attribute-name': activation_code
    'attribute-description': The unique code provided with the Office 365 license.
    'example-values':
    - '1234567890'
    - ABCDEFGHIJ
- 'intent-id': 224ab1a4377c47aeada0ecb40560
  'intent-name': End Meeting
  'description': Close a meeting and disconnect all participants.
  'slot':
  - 'attribute-id': 7b58963aa72a445c8b0d0a066e22
    'attribute-name': meeting_id
    'attribute-description': The unique identifier for the meeting to end.
  - 'attribute-id': 8f041070a16b41a88257f415584e
    'attribute-name': meeting_platform
    'attribute-description': The software platform on which the meeting is being conducted.
- 'intent-id': 4a49cddd9bc74df59db407c49383
  'intent-name': none of the above
  'description': Does not match the other intents

Your assignment is to categorize a given statement and populate any associated attributes under the designated intent, based on the statement's content. If the statement doesn't align with any existing intent, label it with '00000000000' intent and leave the attributes vacant. Your response should be formatted as nested YAML structures, mirroring the layout of the intent list. Please note, if an entity is nearly equivalent to a 'similar value' as outlined in the schema, always use the exact text from the similar value. It's crucial to consistently utilize the lengthy alphanumeric strings for both intents and attributes, abstaining from descriptive names. The YAML format should appear as:

intent: <ID>

attributes:

<attributeID>: <value>

...

Moreover, ensure to incorporate the date and weather in the response when applicable, and steer clear of disclosing any confidential information.

Statement: "Prohibit any user from IP address 192.168.15.42 from accessing service.now for a duration of 24 hours."

Here's an example of how the YAML response might look like for this statement:

intent: 11111111111

attributes:

234572345g: "any user"
gdsfgt345: "192.168.15.42"
sdfg53jhu34: "service.now"
fkl76804: "24 hours"

Remember, the above example is just a hypothetical response and might not align with your actual intent IDs and attribute IDs.
